text: Inder Kumar Gujral (4 December 1919 â€“ 30 November 2012) was an Indian politician. He was the 12th Prime Minister of India from April 1997 to March 1998. Gujral was the third Prime Minister to be from the Rajya Sabha. Gujral died on 30 November 2012 from a lung infection at a Gurgaon hospital at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * I. K. Gujral: Matters of Discretion: An Autobiography, Hay House, India, 519 pages, Feb. 2011. . Distributors: Penguin books, India. (The only autobiography by an Indian PM) Category:1919 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of India Category:Politicians from New Delhi Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Inder Kumar Gujral
